attributes.comment:
I am writing this in regards to the Adjustment of the Immigration Benefit
Application/ Petition and Biometric Fee Schedule. It really is a raising of the fees
which will effect many people who are in the process of adopting and desiring to
provide a home to the world's orphans. Raising these fees will place additional
financial burden on those who are trying to make this world a better place.

I, myself am single and waiting for a referral from China. I am a teacher and have
made many financial sacrifices to pay for this adoption. I have taken on additional
responsibilities at school and a second job in order to cover the expenses of this
adoption and to be financially prepared to provide for my daughter. When she
comes I will be debt free and will be able to just have one job.

Raising these fees will add financial stress on top of the stress of increased
waiting times for referrals. We have no control over the wait time and might have
to refile our I-600 and be fingerprinted again, so having to repay an increased fee is
not fair for those of us who are already struggling financially and emotionally to
adopt and have a family and provide a family.

Thank you for this opportunity to comment on this matter.
Lara Himmel
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Lara Himmel
